column1: The Purple Pig////When we finally sat down
column2: I was very excited because I remembered how good the food was when I last visited 5~ years ago. The ambiance was busy but not toooo noisy. The seats were pretty close together
column3: but not overwhelmingly so. Food all came out pretty quickly
column5: though the explanation of different foods were hurried and apathetic. The wine also came out only after several dishes were served
column6: which was disappointing because I thought the whole point was the pair the food with wine.
